header.title: Hey, I'm Enrique Suarez
header.description: Welcome to my little corner, I am a web and software developer , and I would love to join your team and contribute my bit :)

expecience.title: Work Experience
expecience.subtitle: Marketec 360
expecience.description: Internship at a company for 3 months, responsible for creating interactive web apps using NextJS, React, and TailwindCSS with Github and Git for version control.
expecience.proyects_title: Some of the projects in which I have participated in Marketec360

depilacion_laser.title: Depilacion Laser SHR
depilacion_laser.description: Creation of informative website for SHR laser hair removal clinic, with a contact section. Using Nextjs, React and TailwindCSS

movie_finder.title: Movie Finder App (In development process)
movie_finder.description: Creation of a Movie Finder App using react and TailwindCSS for the FrontEnd, NodeJS and MySQL for the BackEnd with a login for users and creation of an API to obtain the Movies info
